timeline.bodyText: Would you please add an Assert here to validate that the claim hasText?
timeline.author: jzheaux

replies.bodyText: Also, would you please add a test to JwtAuthenticationConverterTests that confirms that the input validation works?
replies.author: jzheaux

timeline.bodyText: Since this will go out in 5.4, would you change the @since to reflect that?
timeline.author: jzheaux

timeline.bodyText: Would you please indicate here what would be the default behavior if this method isn't called?
timeline.author: jzheaux

timeline.message:
